#summary Installation Guide

== Requirements ==

Beside the requirements described in `INSTALL.txt`, you need a working MPI-2 installation. 
The MPI-2 installation must expose the `mpicc` in the `$PATH`.

== Installation ==

To install DistNumPy run the following command:

`CC="mpicc" python dnumpy/setup.py install --prefix /you/dir/`

And the make sure that `/you/dir/` is in your `$PYTHONPATH`.
